title: Julia Restoin Roitfeld Beauty Interview 2013
text: Surprisingly, Roitfeld is open about her use of Pea In The Pod's postpartum belt, followed by Victoria's Secret shapewear, to "put everything back in place." These tools, plus a good blowout, are what has made the famous style star feel like her pre-baby self. For more on Roitfeld's beauty routine (such as the miracle serum that fades scars like a boss), head over to ITG to read the full dish.(Into The Gloss) Photo: Courtesy of Into The Gloss
